title: cannot find profile in reinstall
creator: koisj
content: "Your Thunderbird profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible" keeps appearing mid-screen. version 147.0.1 re-installed several times (Win-10). Transfers of profile attempted from operating PC (Win-10) Cannot locate profile even in a "fresh Install" although the shortcut appears on screen and other associated files seem to be installed. Helps have been downloaded and tried. Same issue. I've received help suggestions from Lin and sfhowes both on 2-6-26.. Thanks for your help.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;os:Windows 10

title: Why has Thunderbird started prompting for Caldav at startup?
creator: rousea
content: For the past few days when I open Thunderbird I get a message "https://caldav.one.com is requesting your username and password." (see attachment). I've never signed up for Caldav so I don't have a username or password. If I hit "Cancel" it proceeds as normal. If I enter my email address and log-in password it also proceeds as normal. In either case I have to go through the same process every time I open Thunderbird.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;tb_version:147.0.1 (64-bit);os:Windows 10/11

title: Thunderbird stopped transferring emails from webmail provider (after 40 or so years) on Feb 5, 2026
creator: crawleyj
content: I now have 2 accounts in Thunderbird: Local (which has years of folders, but stopped receiving email from my Web mail provider) and my webmail Provider that does not download it from the provider. He claimed it is more modern and safer to synchronize across all devices and keep stuff on the web Mail application. I prefer to keep all my folders and emails on my local computer. Should I use POP? iMAP? to do that? Thanks for your assistance?'
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 18_7 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) FxiOS/147.3 Mobile/15E148 Safari/604.1;tb_version:140.7.1esr;os:OS Sequoia 15.7.3

title: TB keeps restoring deleted emails
creator: sjguillemin17
content: After deleting a large number of historical emails, including emptying the Deleted items folder, and emptying the Archive folder, Thunderbird restores a large number - but not all - previously deleted emails. Oddly the emails that are restored to the inbox are only ones from 2022. I have gone through and deleted them multiple times but they keep coming back. Any suggestions? Thanks, Simon.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;tb_version:147.0.1 (64 bit);os:Windows 11

title: Ik vind het heel vervelend dat openstaande emails verwijderd worden als er een update is geweest
creator: astridhendriksen
content: Ik vind het heel vervelend dat openstaande emails verwijderd worden als er een update is geweest. Er staan berichten open waar ik nog iets mee moet doen en dan zijn ze plotseling na een update verwijderd, ik vergeet het dan of ik kan ze niet meer terugvinden. Hoe kan dat veranderd worden

title: Why does "Invalid mail address, must have a domain part" appear when I try to email a contact?
creator: rogerh47
content: I understand having spoken to BT helpline that this problem is known. When will it be fixed?
